    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1841</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Herzl Memorabilia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herzl Erinnerungsstücke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évènements mémorables de Herzl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Memorabilia De Herzl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Memorabilia Di Herzl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναμνηστικά Herzl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Memorabilia De Herzl</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pictures of Herzl's Memorabilia - uncluding various items - Pocket Watch, Cigarette box etc…</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Theodor Herzl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Memorabilia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildungen von Erinnerungsstücken Herzls - 
uncluding verschiedene Einzelteile - stecken Uhr-, Zigarettekasten 
usw. ein?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les images des évènements mémorables de Herzl 
- divers éléments uncluding - empochent le cadre etc.. de montre, de
cigarette ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os retratos de memorabilia de Herzl - vários 
artigos uncluding - pocket a caixa etc. do relógio, do cigarro?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le immagini dei memorabilia del Herzl - vari 
articoli uncluding - intascano il contenitore ecc della sigaretta, di 
vigilanza?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες των αναμνηστικών Herzl - uncluding 
διάφορα αντικείμενα - ρολόι τσεπών, κιβώτιο τσιγάρων κ.λπ...;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Los cuadros de los memorabilia de Herzl - varios
items uncluding - embolsan el rectángulo etc del reloj, del 
cigarrillo?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theodor Herzl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
